attributes.action: Petition for Garth Marenghi’s Darkplace Series 2
attributes.additional_details:
An innovative show about rebellience, Garth Marenghi’s Darkplace, made by the “Orson Welles of Horror” Garth Marenghi, had a troubled history prior to its debut on Channel 4 in 2004.

Filmed, edited and written by visionary and dream-weaver Marenghi, the show was submitted to the network in the mid 1980s and was kept hidden for 20 years because of the daring nature of the series, although it did have a brief stint in Peru.

It’s time for its well earned return. Please sign.
attributes.background:
Garth Marenghi, on reflection in our difficult times, is in fact the most significant television programme of our times since Quantum Leap.

We simply need another series. 

Please contact Pam for more info. She does our admin.
